Class ShutdownMvcEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.mvc.AbstractEndpointMvcAdapter<Endpoint<?>>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MvcEndpoint, NamedMvcEndpoint

    @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="endpoints.shutdown")
public class ShutdownMvcEndpoint
extends EndpointMvcAdapter
    Adapter to expose ShutdownEndpoint as an MvcEndpoint.
